This is a really fun necklace. It is bold, shiny, thick and makes a statement. It goes with a wide array of sweaters, blouses, shirts and is simply delightful. You'll get a lot of wear out of it. And the price makes it a great value.
This necklace is a magnet for compliments
It’s like one of those quarter machine necklaces . Super cheap and lightweight. Don’t waste your money

My friend loved this. Says it’s comfortable around her neck fashionable and sturdy.
I absolutely loved this choker! It looks gorgeous and is versatile enough to be worn for cosplay or any other special event. It adds the perfect touch of elegance and sparkle. Highly recommend!
I’ve worn this several times now and it still looks great. Excellent value.
I love this chain! It’s good quality and although it’s not heavy, it has a good weight to it. It’s not a long chain and has almost a choker appeal. Goes well with denim!

Definitely worth the price.

I get constant compliments on this necklace. It looks like a gorgeous gold chain link piece, but it is light and airy (the thick-looking links are actually 2 smaller loops. It’s super cute), doesn’t weigh down on your neck, and hasn’t tarnished yet. I unfortunately tend to tarnish jewelry quickly, and this still looks brand new. Love it!
